land: ~7m² of land is used to produce 100g of protein.
water: ~ 4323 liters of water is used to produce 1 kg of chicken meat.
grain: 1.5 to 2.0 kg of feed is used to produce 1 kg of chicken meat.
co2: ~ 10 kg of CO₂ is emitted per kg of meat.
lifespan: 5 to 6 weeks in a factory farm vs 8 years in a natural habitat.
slaughter_number: 72 to 77 billion animals are slaughtered per year.
